15521.content:
From the moment I arrived this morning, I sensed some sort of abnormality in my daily ritual in college. From the glares of my female peers, I could tell that they were planning something to do with me. Although, even if there was some sort of conspiracy against me, I understood why my female peers would conspire against me.

The weekend before, during a night out, I took part in a dispute with my girlfriend, Rebecca Keane. Upset by this, I wound up drunk, and as a result, I cheated on her. Everyone in the college found out about this, but as the rumours spread throughout, this turn of events was soon altered by Chinese whispers. There were rumours throughout college that I have done much worse actions in my drunken state. It was of no real surprise that some of my peers from college, particularly the females, would want to get their own back, just to teach me a lesson.

It seemed as if their plan was soon to unfold, but I could not envision what kind of punishment they had in store for me. Perhaps the only fortune in these days of regret was that Rebecca had left on holidays in Greece, and as a result, I did not have to see her for another two weeks. But I couldn't help but wonder if she was involved in this suspicious conspiracy theory, and if so, who would have the privilege to execute my punishment in her place.

It wasn't until after first period that their plan started to unfold. As I wandered from the first lecture of the day, on my way to the restroom, I bumped into a group of the girls in the empty corridor, where there were no witnesses. Among them were Hayley Watkins, Jessica Andrews, Rachael Ellis, Sarah Gibbs, Georgina Parr and Sophie Bennett, all of them had malicious looks upon their faces, each more devious than the next.

The surrounded me, their intentions at this point were still unclear, but I was terrified by what they had in store for me.

"You thought you could get away with it, didn't you?"

I tried to explain my actions, but none of them were listening to me. I used to consider some of these girls my closest friends, but this was a terrifying experience, being circle by a group of girls as if they were apart of some cult. I pleaded for mercy. That was when Rachael pulled out some kind of ring, presumably of ancient heritage. Wearing the ring on her finger, she pointed her fist at me. The diamond ring then started to glow an unearthly colour.

"You will pay for what you've done!"

Suddenly I was blinded by a bright beam of light that shot from the diamond. My vision was impaired, but I could feel my body undergoing several changes. I couldn't tell what was happening to me, but as the power of the ring coursed through my altered body, I could hear the cackles of the girls responsible.

Finally the light faded, and I regained my senses, but when I came to, I was horrified by the outcome.

info.description:
Located on a small island off the coast somewhere near the United Kingdom, Dograb is not your average town. Many strange and mysterious things happen all of the time to the residents. A particular location of these amazing events is Dograb College, where many of the students endure strange and humiliating transformations.

Anything goes in this interactive story, but please keep don't be too graphic, particularly with sex and violence. Adult scenes are permitted, but please, nothing offensive. Homosexuality is permitted, but no pedophilia or beastiality. Stories can take place anywhere in Dograb other than the college, but please try your best not to go any further. If any addition is unsatisfactory to me, I will edit, so please don't be offended by this, I'm just a fussy writer.

This interactive story is based on an idea that someone I met online came up with back when we started chatting years ago. After speaking to him recently, for the first time in ages, he's allowed me to use his ideas and upload them onto writing.com in an interactive format. I never really understood why he never decided to sign into this website and uploaded his work himself but all credit should go to him, so thanks! x
